name: Ash Prime
description: Release Date: July 7, 2015. Ash Prime is the primed variant of the Ash Warframe featuring more powerful stats, possessing a higher shield capacity, armor and sprint speed, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Ember Prime
description: Release Date: November 20th, 2013. Ember Prime is the primed variant of the Ember Warframe with more powerful stats; possessing higher shields and armor, as well as a  and  polarity.

name: Frost Prime
description: Release Date: May 3rd, 2013. Frost Prime is the primed variant of the Frost Warframe featuring more powerful stats, possessing higher shield capacity as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Loki Prime
description: Release Date: June 11th, 2014. Loki Prime is the primed variant of the Loki Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing a higher energy capacity, as well as an additional  and a  polarity.

name: Mag Prime
description: Release Date: September 13th, 2013. Mag Prime is the primed variant of the Mag Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing increased health, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Nova Prime
description: Release Date: December 16, 2014. Nova Prime is the primed variant of the Nova Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing a higher energy capacity and shield capacity, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Nyx Prime
description: Release Date: September 23rd, 2014. Nyx Prime is the primed variant of the Nyx Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing higher armor, sprint speed and shield capacity, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Rhino Prime
description: Release Date: March 5th, 2014. Rhino Prime is the primed variant of the Rhino Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing higher armor and sprint speed, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Saryn Prime
description: Release Date: February 16th, 2016. Saryn Prime is the primed variant of the Saryn Warframe featuring higher armor, sprint speed, and power values, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Trinity Prime
description: Release Date: October 6th, 2015. Trinity Prime is the primed variant of the Trinity Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing a higher shield capacity and sprint speed, as well as having an additional  and  polarity.

name: Vauban Prime
description: Release Date: May 17th, 2016. Vauban Prime is the Prime variant of the Vauban Warframe featuring higher shields and armor values, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Volt Prime
description: Release Date: March 24th, 2015. Volt Prime is the primed variant of the Volt Warframe featuring more powerful stats: possessing a higher energy capacity and armor, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Boar Prime
description: The Boar Prime is an ancient Orokin automatic shotgun that serves as an upgraded version of the Boar. The Boar Prime further improves on the strengths of the Boar, focusing on a high rate of fire, spread, and magazine capacity, on top of improving overall damage. This gives the Boar Prime extremely high damage per second, mitigated only by the short-comings of its predecessor, with its inability to effectively engage targets past short range.

name: Boltor Prime
description: The Boltor Prime is the prime variant of the Boltor rifle. Like its classic version, its bolts' flight time require compensation, making this weapon more difficult to use at longer ranges, and requiring the user to lead targets for effectiveness. Despite this, the Boltor Prime can easily punish close-range targets with its high damage.

name: Braton Prime
description: The Braton Prime is an ancient Orokin assault rifle that serves as an upgrade of the Braton. It features higher base damage and magazine capacity compared to the standard Braton, at the cost of lower ammo reserves. The Braton Prime sports a higher ratio of  Slash damage than the basic Braton, though its  Impact damage is comparatively lower. Overall, the Braton Prime is a formidable weapon, and is considered to be a reasonable upgrade from the basic Braton.

name: Burston Prime
description: The Burston Prime is the prime variant of the Burston. Compared to its predecessor, the Burston Prime features higher damage across the board, and a slightly higher status chance, making it a direct upgrade from the standard Burston. Like the standard Burston, the Burston Prime features the signature three-round burst mechanic, making it difficult for some Tenno to use, but rewarding if one can learn the patterns.

name: Latron Prime
description: The Latron Prime is an ancient Orokin semi-automatic rifle that serves as an upgrade to the Latron, that features higher base damage in the form of more  Puncture damage and critical chance.

name: Paris Prime
description: The Paris Prime features higher base and charge damage, and a faster draw time than the Paris. The Paris Prime was added into the game in Update 9.0.

name: Soma Prime
description: The Soma Prime is the primed version of the Soma assault rifle. It primarily features a greater magazine size, greater ammo reserves, and a slight increase to physical damage and status chance.

name: Vectis Prime
description: The Vectis Prime is the prime version of the Vectis sniper rifle. Featuring higher base damage and a doubled magazine, the Vectis Prime retains the standard version's 4x zoom setting, but swaps the Vectis' 3x zoom for a much higher 10x zoom, allowing for both medium and long range combat.

name: Akbronco Prime
description: The Akbronco Prime lowers  Impact damage to increase  Slash damage, while gaining increased firing rate, critical damage, status chance and magazine size. The Akbronco Prime was added into the game in Update 12.4.

name: Akstiletto Prime
description: Akstiletto Prime is the Prime variant of the Akstiletto.

name: Bronco Prime
description: The Bronco Prime features a higher base damage and magazine size than the Bronco, at the cost of a lower fire rate and reload speed. The Bronco Prime was added into the game in Update 9.0.

name: Hikou Prime
description: The Hikou Prime is the primed version of the Hikou throwing stars, released in Update 14.8.

name: Lex Prime
description: The Lex Prime is the primed version of the Lex heavy pistol, featuring improved stats.

name: Sicarus Prime
description: The Sicarus Prime is an improved Sicarus that sacrifices nearly half of its  Impact damage to double  Puncture and  Slash damage, and also sports higher accuracy, faster fire rate, and a larger magazine compared to its predecessor.

name: Spira Prime
description: The Spira Prime is the Primed variant of the Spira throwing daggers featuring a boost to its Fire Rate, Reload Speed, Status Effect chance, Critical chance and Critical multiplier in exchange for reduced damage.

name: Vasto Prime
description: The primed version of the Vasto revolver, the Vasto Prime features enhanced damage over the original.

name: Ankyros Prime
description: The Ankyros Prime are the primed version of Ankyros, added in Update 12.4.

name: Bo Prime
description: The Bo Prime is the primed variant of the Bo staff. It was added in Update 13.7, featuring higher damage and an additional  polarity.

name: Dakra Prime
description: The Dakra Prime is a standalone prime melee weapon which was added to the game in Update 10.0.

name: Dual Kamas Prime
description: The Dual Kamas Prime are the Primed versions of the Dual Kamas, featuring higher damage as well as improvements to most stats.

name: Fang Prime
description: Fang Prime features a higher base damage than Fang as well as a faster attack speed. The Fang Prime was added into the game in Update 9.0.

name: Fragor Prime
description: Fragor Prime is the Prime variant of the Fragor.

name: Glaive Prime
description: The Glaive Prime is a Primed version of the Glaive. The Glaive Prime was added into the game in Update 11.0. If thrown, this weapon will bounce five times before returning to its owner or after reaching 30m away from its owner.

name: Nikana Prime
description: The Nikana Prime is the primed version of the Nikana, added in Hotfix 18.4.12.

name: Orthos Prime
description: The Orthos Prime features a higher base damage, range, and attack speed than the Orthos. The Orthos Prime was added into the game in Update 9.

name: Reaper Prime
description: The Reaper Prime is a standalone prime melee Scythe, added to the game in Update 8, along with the Frost Prime Warframe, and the Latron Prime.

name: Scindo Prime
description: The primed version of the Scindo, the Scindo Prime offers improved overall statistics to the original, with increased damage, speed, critical chance, and status. Providing a formidable weapon surpassing the original, and many of its peers in the heavy blade category. Like the original, the Scindo Prime is also compatible with the Manticore skin, providing damage at the cost of speed.

name: Carrier Prime
description: The Primed version of the Carrier Sentinel, the Carrier Prime features increased health and armor, and comes with the enhanced Sweeper Prime weapon.

name: Wyrm Prime
description: Wyrm Prime is the first Prime Sentinel, a version of Wyrm featuring Orokin styling and modified stats.

name: Kavasa Prime Collar
description: The Kavasa Prime Collar is a Prime collar of Orokin design that can be equipped on a player's Kubrow. It records their genetic memory and DNA, allowing them to be reconstructed in an Incubator, just like the Taichen Collar. Equipping the collar grants +10 Health, +10 Shields, and +100 Armor to a kubrow. Health bonus is modified by DNA Stability.

name: Odonata Prime
description: Release Date: March 24th, 2015. Comparisons:

name: Prisma Skana
description: The Prisma Skana is a special Prisma version of the Skana longsword, featuring enhanced attack speed, critical chance and critical damage.

name: Prisma Dual Cleavers
description: The Prisma Dual Cleavers are the special Prisma version of the Dual Cleavers, featuring enhanced attack speed and status chance, while lowering  Puncture and  Impact damages to increase  Slash damage.

name: Prisma Gorgon
description: The Prisma Gorgon is a variant of the Gorgon light machine gun that features a unique Prisma skin and modified stats, which dependent on current trades, can be temporarily available from the Void Trader, Baro Ki'Teer. Like its predecessor, the Prisma Gorgon sports a sizable magazine size with a high rate of fire, offset by the spooling time and long reload time. Notably, the Prisma Gorgon grants higher magazine and ammo reserve values along with its other boosted stats over its predecessor.

name: Prisma Grakata
description: The Prisma Grakata is a Void Trader-exclusive variant of the Grakata assault rifle featuring a unique Prisma finish and enhanced stats.

name: Prisma Veritux
description: The Prisma Veritux is the Veritux sword for the Archwing with enhanced stats and a unique Prisma skin.

name: Arcane Acceleration
description: Arcane Acceleration is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on each critical hit to increase the rate of fire of rifle weapons for a short time.

name: Arcane Aegis
description: Arcane Aegis is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player receives damage to regenerate Warframe Shield for a short time.

name: Arcane Agility
description: Arcane Agility is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player receives damage to increase Warframe sprint speed for a short time.

name: Arcane Arachne
description: Arcane Arachne is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player wall latches to increase damage for the next hit on an enemy.

name: Arcane Avenger
description: Arcane Avenger is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player receives damage to increase the critical chance of all attacks for a short time.

name: Arcane Awakening
description: Arcane Awakening is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on reloading any weapon to increase the damage of secondary weapons for a short time.

name: Arcane Barrier
description: Arcane Barrier is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player receives damage to instantly restore shields.

name: Arcane Consequence
description: Arcane Consequence is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player upon achieving a headshot to increase Wall Latch and Aim Glide for a short time.

name: Arcane Deflection
description: Arcane Deflection is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to resist a  Slash damage effect entirely.

name: Arcane Energize
description: Arcane Energize is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to replenish additional energy for you and nearby allies whenever an Energy Orb is picked up.

name: Arcane Eruption
description: Arcane Eruption is an Arcane Enhancement  that provides a chance whenever an energy orb is picked up to knock down nearby enemies.

name: Arcane Grace
description: Arcane Grace is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player receives damage to regenerate a percentage of health per second for a short time.

name: Arcane Healing
description: Arcane Healing is an Arcane Enhancement  that provides a chance to resist a  Radiation damage effect entirely.

name: Arcane Ice
description: Arcane Ice is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to resist a  Heat damage effect entirely.

name: Arcane Momentum
description: Arcane Momentum is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to increase the Fire Rate on Sniper-type weapons whenever the player achieves a critical Hit.

name: Arcane Nullifier
description: Arcane Nullifier is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to resist a  Magnetic damage effect entirely.

name: Arcane Phantasm
description: Arcane Phantasm is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on performing a parry to increase Warframe sprint speed for a short time.

name: Arcane Precision
description: Arcane Precision is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player upon achieving a headshot to increase Damage on Secondaries for a short time.

name: Arcane Rage
description: Arcane Rage is an Arcane Enhancement that upon achieving a headshot provides a chance to increase rifle damage for a short time.

name: Arcane Resistance
description: Arcane Resistance is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to resist an  Electric damage effect entirely.

name: Arcane Strike
description: Arcane Strike is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on each hit with any weapon to increase the speed of melee attacks for a short time.

name: Arcane Tempo
description: Arcane Tempo is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player upon achieving a critical Hit to increase Fire Rate on Shotguns for a short time.

name: Arcane Trickery
description: Arcane Trickery is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance on performing a melee finisher to grant the Warframe invisibility for a short time.

name: Arcane Ultimatum
description: Arcane Ultimatum is an Arcane Enhancement that, upon performing a melee finisher, provides a chance to increase Warframe Armor for a short time.

name: Arcane Velocity
description: Arcane Velocity is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance whenever the player upon achieving a critical Hit to increase Fire Rate on Secondaries for a short time.

name: Arcane Victory
description: Arcane Victory is an Arcane Enhancement that upon achieving a headshot provides a chance to gain health regeneration for a short time.

name: Arcane Warmth
description: Arcane Warmth is an Arcane Enhancement that provides a chance to resist a  Cold damage effect entirely.

name: Life Strike
description: While Channeling, the Life Strike mod increases Life Steal, i.e. converts weapon damage to health, but dramatically decreases Channeling efficiency.

name: Quickening
description: Quickening increases the attack speed of melee weapons while channeling at the cost of reduced channeling efficiency.

name: Corrupt Charge
description: Corrupt Charge increases the Channeling damage of melee weapons while reducing Channeling efficiency.

name: Vengeful Revenant
description: Vengeful Revenant is a Stance Mod for Sword type weapons.

name: Fleeting Expertise
description: Fleeting Expertise increases Power Efficiency but reduces Power Duration of Warframe abilities.

name: Narrow Minded
description: Narrow Minded increases Power Duration while reducing Power Range of Warframe abilities.

name: Overextended
description: Overextended increases Power Range while reducing Power Strength of Warframe abilities.

name: Critical Delay
description: The Critical Delay mod increases the critical hit chance by 8% per rank while reducing the fire rate by -6% per rank of rifles for a maximum of 48% critical hit chance and -36% fire rate at rank 5.

name: Heavy Caliber
description: Heavy Caliber increases damage of Primary Weapons (excluding Shotguns) at the cost of reduced accuracy by 15% and -5% per rank, at a maximum of 165% and -55% at rank 10, respectively.

name: Vile Precision
description: The Vile Precision mod decreases weapon recoil by -10% per rank and fire rate by -6% per rank of primary weapons for a maximum of -60% weapon recoil and -36% fire rate at Rank 5.

name: Tainted Mag
description: Tainted Mag is an assault rifle mod that increases magazine capacity while decreasing the reload speed.

name: Vile Acceleration
description: Vile Acceleration is a Corrupted Mod for rifles and Bows that increases their Fire Rate by 15% per rank to 90% at rank 5 but decreases damage by -2.5% per rank to -15% at rank 5. The increase in fire rate is doubled for bows.

name: Depleted Reload
description: Depleted Reload is a Corrupted sniper rifle mod that decreases magazine capacity and increases reload speed.

name: Burdened Magazine
description: Burdened Magazine increases magazine capacity while reducing the reload speed of Shotguns.

name: Vicious Spread
description: Vicious Spread increases the damage and spread of shotguns by 15% and 10% per rank to a maximum of 90% and 60% at Rank 5, respectively.

name: Tainted Shell
description: The Tainted Shell mod reduces the spread of Shotgun fire by -7% per rank while also decreasing the fire rate by -5% per rank for a maximum of reduced spread by -77% and reduced fire rate by -55% at rank 10.

name: Frail Momentum
description: Frail Momentum is a Corrupted Mod that increases the Fire Rate of shotguns at the cost of damage by 15% and -2.5% per rank at a maximum of 90% and -15% at rank 5, respectively.

name: Critical Deceleration
description: The Critical Deceleration mod increases the critical hit chance by 8% per rank while reducing the Fire Rate by -5% per rank of shotguns for a maximum of 48% critical hit chance and -30% fire rate at rank 5.

name: Anemic Agility
description: Anemic Agility is a Corrupted Mod that increases a pistol's Fire Rate by 15% per rank but decreases its damage  by 2.5% per rank, for a maximum of 90% fire rate and -15% damage at rank 5.

name: Creeping Bullseye
description: The Creeping Bullseye mod increases the critical hit chance by 8% per rank while reducing the Fire Rate by -6% per rank of pistols for a maximum of 48% critical hit chance and -36% fire rate at rank 5.

name: Hollow Point
description: Hollow Point increases critical hit damage while reducing the damage of Pistols.

name: Magnum Force
description: Magnum Force increases damage of secondary weapons at the cost of reduced accuracy by 6% and -3% per rank, at a maximum of 66% and -33% at rank 10, respectively.

name: Tainted Clip
description: Tainted Clip increases pistol magazine capacity while decreasing reload speed.

name: Spoiled Strike
description: The Spoiled Strike mod increases damage by 25% per rank while reducing attack speed by -5% per rank of melee attacks for a maximum of 100% damage and -20% attack speed at rank 3.

name: Power Drift
description: Power Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that increases Power Strength and grants a chance to resist knockdown.

name: Coaction Drift
description: Coaction Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that increases an Aura's strength and effectiveness.

name: Cunning Drift
description: Cunning Drift is a rare triple-stat Exilus mod that increases slide, reduces friction and increases Power Range.

name: Speed Drift
description: Speed Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that increases sprint speed and casting speed.

name: Endurance Drift
description: Endurance Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that increases Maximum Energy and parkour velocity.

name: Agility Drift
description: Agility Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that reduces damage taken while airborne and reduces enemy accuracy when targeting the player.[1]

name: Stealth Drift
description: Stealth Drift is a rare dual-stat Exilus mod that increases enemy detection on the minimap and Aim Glide and Wall Latch time.

name: Body Count
description: Body Count is a common Melee mod that extends the duration of the Melee Combo Counter.

name: Focused Defense
description: Focused Defense is a melee mod that increases armor while channeling at the cost of reduced channeling efficiency.

name: Weeping Wounds
description: Weeping Wounds is an uncommon Melee mod that increases Status chance as the Melee Combo Multiplier increases.

name: Maiming Strike
description: Maiming Strike is a rare Melee mod that increases the chance of a Critical Hit on slide attacks.

name: Argon Scope
description: Argon Scope is a rare rifle mod that increases critical chance while aiming for a brief time upon a headshot.

name: Bladed Rounds
description: Bladed Rounds is an uncommon Rifle mod that increases Critical damage while aiming for a brief time upon a kill.

name: Catalyzer Link
description: Catalyzer Link is a common Rifle mod that increases Status chance while aiming for a brief time after casting an ability.

name: Spring-Loaded Chamber
description: Spring-Loaded Chamber is an uncommon Assault Rifle mod that increases Fire Rate while aiming for a brief time upon reloading.

name: Shrapnel Shot
description: Shrapnel Shot is a common Shotgun mod that increases Critical damage while aiming for a brief time upon a kill.

name: Laser Sight
description: Laser Sight is an uncommon Shotgun mod that increases Critical chance while aiming for a brief time upon a headshot.

name: Repeater Clip
description: Repeater Clip is an uncommon Shotgun mod that increases Fire Rate while aiming for a brief time upon reloading.

name: Nano-Applicator
description: Nano-Applicator is a rare Shotgun mod that increases Status chance while aiming for a brief time after casting an ability.

name: Narrow Barrel
description: Narrow Barrel is a shotgun mod that temporarily increases accuracy while aiming upon hitting an enemy.

name: Hydraulic Crosshairs
description: Hydraulic Crosshairs is a common Pistol mod that increases Critical chance while aiming for a brief time upon a headshot.

name: Embedded Catalyzer
description: Embedded Catalyzer is an uncommon Pistol mod that increases Status chance while aiming for a brief time after casting an ability.

name: Sharpened Bullets
description: Sharpened Bullets is an uncommon Pistol mod that increases Critical damage while aiming for a brief time upon a kill.

name: Targeting Subsystem
description: Targeting Subsystem is a Pistol mod that temporarily increases accuracy while aiming upon hitting an enemy.

name: Pressurized Magazine
description: Pressurized Magazine is a rare Pistol mod that increases Fire Rate while aiming for a brief time upon reloading.

name: Primed Continuity
description: Primed Continuity increases the Power Duration of Warframe abilities and is a direct upgrade to the Continuity mod.

name: Primed Pistol Gambit
description: Primed Pistol Gambit is the primed version of the Pistol Gambit mod, which increases the critical chance of secondary weapons.

name: Primed Target Cracker
description: Primed Target Cracker is the Primed version of Target Cracker, which increases the critical damage of Pistols.

name: Primed Rifle Ammo Mutation
description: Primed Rifle Ammo Mutation is the Primed version of the Rifle Ammo Mutation mod for assault rifles, which converts any unused ammo type into Rifle Ammo. The affected rifle will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered secondary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Primed Pistol Mutation
description: Primed Pistol Mutation is the Primed version of the Pistol Ammo Mutation mod for pistols, which converts any unused ammo type into Pistol Ammo, or Sniper Ammo in the case of most explosive sidearms. The affected pistol will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered primary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Tempo Royale
description: Tempo Royale is a Stance Mod for Heavy Blades, specializing in fast, mobile and smooth spinning attacks. This stance sports more graceful maneuvers than its companion stances, utilizing flips and overhead slashes to attain mobility, ultimately providing opportunities to finish enemies with devastating attacks.

name: Shred
description: The Shred mod increases the Fire Rate of Primary weapons by 5% and Punch Through by 0.2 meter per rank for a maximum of 30% and 1.2 meter at Rank 5, respectively.

name: Buzz Kill
description: The Buzz Kill mod increases  Slash damage of a melee weapon by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Primed Chamber
description: Not to be confused with Charged Chamber.

name: High Voltage
description: The High Voltage mod increases both the  Electricity damage and Status Chance of a rifle by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Rime Rounds
description: The Rime Rounds mod increases both the  Cold damage and Status Chance of rifles by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Thermite Rounds
description: The Thermite Rounds mod increases both the  Heat damage and Status Chance of a rifle by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at Rank 3.

name: Jolt
description: The Jolt mod increases both the  Electricity damage and Status Chance of a pistol by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Piercing Caliber
description: The Piercing Caliber mod increases  Puncture damage of a rifle by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at Rank 5.

name: Fanged Fusillade
description: The Fanged Fusillade mod increases  Slash damage of a rifle by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Shell Shock
description: The Shell Shock mod increases both the  Electricity damage and Status Chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Voltaic Strike
description: The Voltaic Strike mod increases both the  Electricity damage and Status Chance of a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Malignant Force
description: The Malignant Force mod increases both the  Toxin damage and Status Chance of a rifle by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Sweeping Serration
description: The Sweeping Serration mod increases  Slash damage of a shotgun by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Frigid Blast
description: The Frigid Blast mod increases both the  Cold damage and Status Chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Volcanic Edge
description: The Volcanic Edge mod increases both the  Heat damage and Status Chance of a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Virulent Scourge
description: The Virulent Scourge mod increases both the  Toxin Damage and Status Chance of a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Vicious Frost
description: The Vicious Frost mod increases both the  Cold damage and Status Chance of a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Auger Strike
description: The Auger Strike mod increases  Puncture damage of a melee weapon by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Collision Force
description: The Collision Force mod increases  Impact damage of melee weapons by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Magma Chamber
description: The Magma Chamber mod increases the  Heat damage and chance of status effect of Archwing guns by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Pistol Pestilence
description: The Pistol Pestilence mod increases the  Toxin Damage and Status Chance of a pistol by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Toxic Barrage
description: The Toxic Barrage mod increases both the  Toxin damage and Status Chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Aviator
description: Aviator reduces damage taken while airborne.

name: Bore
description: The Bore mod increases  Puncture damage of a pistol by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at Rank 5.

name: Pummel
description: The Pummel mod increases  Impact damage of a pistol by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Crash Course
description: The Crash Course mod increases  Impact damage of rifles by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Full Contact
description: The Full Contact mod increases  Impact damage of shotguns by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Searing Steel
description: The Searing Steel mod increases the  Heat damage and Status Chance on Archwing melee weapons by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Maim
description: The Maim mod increases  Slash damage of a pistol by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Vaykor Hek
description: The Vaykor Hek is a Hek variant available only from Steel Meridian. Boasting double the magazine capacity of the base variant, a faster rate of fire, and an increased critical chance, the Vaykor Hek also comes with an innate Justice effect. It does, however, take slightly longer to reload than the base variant.

name: Vaykor Marelok
description: The Vaykor Marelok is a Marelok variant available only from Steel Meridian. Boasting a larger magazine, critical chance and status chance, the Vaykor Marelok also comes with an innate Justice effect.

name: Telos Boltor
description: The Telos Boltor is an exclusive version of the Boltor available only from the Arbiters of Hexis. Featuring improved stats and an additional polarity slot, the Telos Boltor also features innate Truth effect.

name: Telos Akbolto
description: The Telos Akbolto is an exclusive version of the Akbolto available only from the Arbiters of Hexis. Featuring improved stats, the Telos Akbolto also features innate Truth effect.

name: Synoid Simulor
description: The Synoid Simulor is a custom-version of the Simulor available only from Cephalon Suda, which launches orbs of gravitational force. These orbs can be manipulated to produce either explosions or implosions.  Featuring improved stats, the Synoid Simulor also features innate Entropy effect.

name: Synoid Gammacor
description: The Synoid Gammacor is an exclusive version of the Gammacor available only from Cephalon Suda, possessing better stats as well as innate Entropy effect.

name: Secura Penta
description: The Secura Penta is the Perrin Sequence exclusive version of the Penta grenade launcher. Compared to the regular Penta, it has a significantly increased rate of fire, increased magazine capacity, and slightly increased explosion damage. It also comes with an innate Sequence effect.

name: Secura Dual Cestra
description: The Secura Dual Cestra is a modified version of the Dual Cestra exclusive to The Perrin Sequence, featuring better stats and innate Sequence effect.

name: Rakta Cernos
description: The Rakta Cernos is a modified Cernos bow exclusively available to the Red Veil. It features the fastest charge time of all bows, along with increased base damage, status chance, and innate Blight effect.

name: Rakta Ballistica
description: The Rakta Ballistica is an exclusive version of the Ballistica available only from the Red Veil. The Rakta Ballistica has a higher portion of  Puncture damage than its default version, and features a larger magazine as well as innate Blight effect.

name: Sancti Tigris
description: The Sancti Tigris is a Tigris variant available only from New Loka. Featuring increased damage, reload speed, and critical chance, the Sancti Tigris also comes with an innate Purity effect.

name: Sancti Castanas
description: The Sancti Castanas are an exclusive version of the Castanas available only from New Loka. It has higher base damage, status and critical chance as well as innate Purity effect.

name: Mara Detron
description: The Mara Detron is a time-limited edition of the Detron that has altered stats along with a unique animated skin.

name: Cyngas
description: This weapon deals primarily  Slash damage by a small margin

name: Crimson Dervish
description: Crimson Dervish is a Stance for swords, specializing in strong spinning attacks that can hit adjacent enemies or deal multiple strikes against a single foe, sacrificing mobility and speed. Combos executed in this stance are notable for their high damage multiplier.

name: Crushing Ruin
description: Crushing Ruin is one of two Stance mods for Hammer type weapons. Wielders of this Stance thrust in strong whirlwind attacks.

name: Cleaving Whirlwind
description: Cleaving Whirlwind is a Stance mod for Heavy Blade melee weapons. It is a momentum-based stance whose slow, sweeping attacks deal high damage in coned or radial areas around the wielder.

name: Final Harbinger
description: Final Harbinger is a Stance mod for Sword and Shield melee weapons.

name: Decisive Judgement
description: Decisive Judgement is a Stance Mod for Nikanas, which features two-handed slashes that can send the user airborne.

name: Tranquil Cleave
description: Tranquil Cleave is a Stance mod for Nikanas. This stance features swift and precise single-handed slashes.

name: Blind Justice
description: Blind Justice is a Stance mod for Nikanas, specializing in high mobility combined with fast overhead slashes.

name: High Noon
description: High Noon is a Stance mod for gunblades, blending swift slashes with gunshots.

name: Swirling Tiger
description: Swirling Tiger is one of two available Stance mods for Dual Swords type weapons. Its sweeping attacks specialize in dealing damage across multiple foes.

name: Rending Crane
description: Rending Crane is one of the Stance Mods for Heavy Blade melee weapons, which specializes in overhead slashes with powerful knockdown finishers.

name: Iron Phoenix
description: Iron Phoenix is a Stance mod for longswords, that provide very mobile combos that allows users to move semi-freely.

name: Astral Twilight
description: Astral Twilight is one of two available Stance mods for Glaive-type weapons, featuring highly mobile spins and sweeping slashes.

name: Defiled Snapdragon
description: Defiled Snapdragon is a Stance Mod for Blade and Whip type weapons.

name: Vulpine Mask
description: Vulpine Mask is a Stance Mod for Rapier type weapons.

name: Shimmering Blight
description: Shimmering Blight is a Stance Mod for polearms that allows for rapid, spinning strikes which hit multiple enemies, and finishes with powerful, slashing strikes.

name: Crossing Snakes
description: Crossing Snakes is one of two Stance mods for Dual Sword type weapons. Wielders of this Stance thrust at foes with deadly jabs.

name: Bleeding Willow
description: Bleeding Willow is a Stance Mod for polearm weapons, specializing in lunging, sweeping attacks that can hit large swathes of enemies.

name: Atlantis Vulcan
description: Atlantis Vulcan is a Stance for Nunchaku-type weapons, specializing in fast, multi-hit whirling strikes.

name: Eleventh Storm
description: Eleventh Storm is a Stance mod for Sword and Shield weapons that blends fast sword swings with shield bashes.

name: Four Riders
description: Four Riders is a Rare Stance mod for Claw-type weapons, featuring fast strikes and powerful slams.

name: Pointed Wind
description: Pointed Wind is a Stance mod for daggers that specializes in high damage, sweeping slashes and jumping strikes.

name: Gnashing Payara
description: Gnashing Payara is a Stance Mod for dual daggers that deals spinning attacks, stabs and slashes.

name: Spinning Needle
description: Can be equipped on:

name: Flailing Branch
description: Flailing Branch is a Stance mod for staff weapons.

name: Vermilion Storm
description: Vermilion Storm is a Rare Stance mod for Claw weapons.

name: Brutal Tide
description: Brutal Tide is one of two Stance mods for hands & feet weapons, featuring highly agile sweeping kicks combined with powerful fist attacks.

name: Gleaming Talon
description: Gleaming Talon is one of two available Stance mods for Glaives, which combines whirling attacks with explosive weapon throws.

name: Seismic Palm
description: Seismic Palm is one of three Stance mods for fist weapons like the Furax. It features staggering and knockdowns.

name: Coiling Viper
description: Coiling Viper is one of two Stance mods for Whip type weapons. Wielders of this Stance trade range for highly mobile attacks. True to the namesake, the attack style of the stance greatly resembles a slithering Viper as opposed to Burning Wasp's flowing style.

name: Malicious Raptor
description: Malicious Raptor is a rare Stance mod for Claw-type weapons.

name: Clashing Forest
description: Clashing Forest is one of two Stance mods compatible with Staff type weapons. It is a highly mobile stance in which the Tenno advances in tandem with their strikes.

name: Reaping Spiral
description: Reaping Spiral is a Scythe Stance mod that features somersaults and high damage weapon throws.

name: Homing Fang
description: Homing Fang is a Stance mod for daggers that features highly mobile spinning attacks and powerful finishers.

name: Gemini Cross
description: Gemini Cross is a Stance mod for Tonfa-type weapons.

name: Fateful Truth
description: Fateful Truth is a PvP exclusive Stance mod for Nikanas.

name: Sinking Talon
description: Sinking Talon is a Stance Mod for dual daggers.

name: Sundering Weave
description: Sundering Weave is the only available Stance mod for Machete-type weapons. It specializes in steady strikes combined with forward-striking finishers.

name: Burning Wasp
description: Burning Wasp is one of two available Stance mods for Whip type weapons. It is a specialized Stance that trades speed for range, its focused lashing attacks being able to hit targets from deceptively long ranges. The style of the stance utilizes a more flowing combo as opposed to Coiling Viper's slithering, coiling style.

name: Fracturing Wind
description: Fracturing Wind is one of three Stance Mods for Fist type weapons. Wielders of this Stance can deliver a barrage of fast punches and deliver powerful knockdowns.

name: Nekros Prime
description: Release Date: August 23rd, 2016. Nekros Prime is the Prime variant of the Nekros Warframe featuring higher shields and power values, as well as an additional  polarity.

name: Galatine Prime
description: Galatine Prime is the primed variant of the Galatine heavy sword.

name: Tigris Prime
description: The Tigris Prime is the primed variant of the Tigris shotgun.

name: Telos Boltace
description: The Telos Boltace is the Syndicate variant of the Boltace, available only from the Arbiters of Hexis. On slide attacks, the weapon produces an energy wave from the player that spreads in all directions, dealing high damage to nearby enemies. Additionally, switching to the Telos Boltace increases the velocity or duration of certain Maneuvers.

name: Synoid Heliocor
description: The Synoid Heliocor is the Syndicate variant of the Heliocor, unique to Cephalon Suda. In addition to its ability to scan targets it kills into the Codex, this Synoid version also creates a friendly Specter of an enemy it kills with a channeled strike, so long as said enemy's Codex entry is complete.

name: Sancti Magistar
description: The Sancti Magistar is the Syndicate variant of the Magistar, available from New Loka. It has the unique ability to heal allies when connecting with a melee charged attack, and also reduces damage from Status Effects for its wielder.

name: Secura Lecta
description: The Secura Lecta is the Syndicate variant of the Lecta, exclusive to the Perrin Sequence, with the unique ability to double the amount of credits dropped by enemies it kills.

name: Rakta Dark Dagger
description: The Rakta Dark Dagger is the Syndicate variant of the Dark Dagger, available from the Red Veil. While held, It reduces visibility  and restores shields or grants overshields when damaging a target afflicted by  Radiation.

name: Vaykor Sydon
description: The Vaykor Sydon is the Syndicate variant of the Sydon, available from Steel Meridian. It has the unique ability to store charges when blocking, which can be released as a Radial Blind once full.

name: Sovereign Outcast
description: Sovereign Outcast is a Stance mod for Tonfa-type weapons.

name: Valkyr Prime
description: Release date: November 22nd, 2016. Valkyr Prime is the Prime variant of the Valkyr Warframe featuring higher armor and power values, as well as an additional Madurai Pol polarity.

name: Cernos Prime
description: The Cernos Prime is an ancient Orokin bow that serves as an upgrade of the Cernos, featuring improved stats as well as the ability to fire multiple arrows at once.

name: Venka Prime
description: The Venka Prime are ancient Orokin claws that serve as an upgrade of the Venka. Apart from having higher base damage and slightly faster attack speed, the Venka Prime also has an improved melee combo multiplier.

name: Machete Wraith
description: The Machete Wraith is a unique Wraith variant of the Machete, featuring an increased base damage. Originally obtained from completing at least 25 missions during The Gradivus Dilemma, the Machete Wraith is the second Wraith weapon to be released, after the Strun Wraith.

name: Vulkar Wraith
description: The Vulkar Wraith is the Wraith variant of the Vulkar.This weapon can be sold for 7,500‍ 7,500.

name: Helios Prime
description: Helios Prime is the Orokin-enhanced version of the Helios Sentinel and is equipped with Deconstructor Prime.

name: Euphona Prime
description: The Euphona Prime is a Prime shotgun type sidearm and the signature weapon of Banshee Prime, capable of two different firing modes. The primary fire shoots a slug for longer range engagements while the Alternate Fire shoots wider spread shots for close range fights.

name: Banshee Prime
description: Release date: 28 February 2017. Banshee Prime is the Prime variant of the Banshee Warframe featuring higher armor, sprint speed, and power values, as well as an additional Naramon Pol polarity.

name: Animal Instinct
description: Animal Instinct is a Companion mod that gives Enemy Sense and Loot Detection effects to the companion's owner. It can be equipped on both Sentinels and Kubrows.[1] Unlike the equivalent Warframe auras (with which these effects stack), these effects only apply to the owner and not the other players in the squad, and they cease if the companion dies during the mission.

name: Bite
description: Bite mod increases Kubrow and Kavat Critical Chance & Critical Damage.

name: Dig
description: The Dig mod allows the Sahasa Kubrow to dig up items upon the battlefield. They will be able to dig up random ammunition types, health orbs, energy orbs, small amounts of credits, and occasionally mods.

name: Hastened Deflection
description: Hastened Deflection speeds up a Kubrow's shield regeneration rate. It has no effect on recharge delay.

name: Howl
description: Howl mod allows Raksa Kubrow to cry out a blood-curdling howl to strike fear into its foes.

name: Ferocity
description: The Ferocity  mod allows the Sahasa Kubrow to use finisher attacks on enemies.

name: Link Armor
description: Link Armor is a Companion mod that allows the owner to share their armor as an addition to the Companion's armor.

name: Hunt
description: Hunt  mod allows the Huras Kubrow to tackle a nearby opponent. The tackle can also hit multiple targets.

name: Link Health
description: Link Health is a Kubrow mod that increases its health based on a percentage of the player's health. The player's health is unaffected by this mod.

name: Loyal Companion
description: Loyal Companion is a Kubrow and Kavat mod that allows the owner to share their Bleedout time as an extension to their companion's Bleedout time.

name: Maul
description: Maul mod increases the melee damage a Kubrow deals by 30% per rank to a maximum of 330% at rank 10.

name: Pack Leader
description: Pack Leader is a mod that heals an incubated companion by a percentage of the damage dealt by a player with melee attacks.

name: Neutralize
description: Neutralize is a Kubrow exclusive mod that allows the Chesa Kubrow to disarm enemies.

name: Shelter
description: Shelter allows a Kubrow to create a Shield around its master while they revive fallen Allies.

name: Brief Respite
description: Brief Respite is an aura that grants additional Shields equal to a percentage of Energy spent whenever an ability is cast.

name: Link Shields
description: Link Shields increases a Kubrow's maximum shields by adding a percent of the Warframe's shields to its own shields.

name: Protect
description: Protect mod allows Raksa Kubrow to come to the defense of its master, replenishing both their shields and its own.

name: Stalk
description: The Stalk mod allows the Huras Kubrow to cloak itself and its master when hostile entities are within range, similar to Shade's Ghost Precept.

name: Dead Eye
description: Dead Eye is an Aura that increases the damage dealt with sniper rifles by 8.75% per rank, up to 35% at maximum.

name: Loot Detector
description: Loot Detector will display resources, lootable canisters, chests, crates, and lootable corpses (which only appear during the self-destruction environmental hazard) on the mini-map for all players on a mission, as well as locate Medallions in Syndicate Alert Missions and Resource Cache in Sabotage missions.  It will not display lockers or dropped blueprints.

name: Rifle Scavenger
description: Rifle Scavenger is an Aura that increases the amount of rifle ammo recovered per drop.

name: Sprint Boost
description: Sprint Boost is an Aura that increases sprint speed of Warframes.

name: Energy Siphon
description: Energy Siphon is an Aura that regenerates all team members' energy.

name: Retrieve
description: Retrieve is a Kubrow exclusive mod that allows the Chesa Kubrow to retrieve items.

name: Enemy Sense
description: Enemy Sense displays all enemies within its radius with red markers on the mini-map. This includes Latchers thrown by Grineer Seekers and Maggots spawned by Brood Mothers, but does not include cameras and turrets present in Corpus missions.

name: Flow
description: Flow increases the Maximum Energy reserve of a Warframe.

name: Intensify
description: Intensify increases the Power Strength of Warframe abilities.

name: Savagery
description: Savagery mod allows the Sunika Kubrow to overwhelm its prey with a powerful finisher attack.

name: Rejuvenation
description: Rejuvenation is an Aura that regenerates all team members' health every second.

name: Medi-Pet Kit
description: Medi-Pet Kit is a companion Index mod that provides health regeneration and a bleedout timer increase to the companion.

name: Enemy Radar
description: Enemy Radar is an Aura that allows you and your teammates to see enemies on your mini-maps.

name: Armored Agility
description: Armored Agility increases the Sprint Speed and armor of Warframes.

name: Continuity
description: Continuity increases the Power Duration of a Warframe's abilities.

name: Scavenge
description: Scavenge mod gives Kubrows and Kavats a chance to unlock lockers.

name: Corrosive Projection
description: Corrosive Projection is an aura that reduces armor for all enemies in a mission.

name: Infested Impedance
description: Infested Impedance is an Aura that reduces the speed of Infested enemies within 8m radius from the user.

name: Shotgun Scavenger
description: Shotgun Scavenger is an Aura that increases the amount of shotgun ammo recovered per drop.

name: Steel Charge
description: Steel Charge is an Aura that increases the damage dealt by melee weapons.

name: Constitution
description: Constitution increases Warframe Knockdown Recovery and Power Duration of Warframe abilities.

name: Fast Deflection
description: Fast Deflection increases the Shield recharge rate of a Warframe. It has no effect on the recharge delay.

name: Handspring
description: Handspring speeds up a Warframe's knock-down recovery rate.

name: Flame Repellent
description: Flame Repellent increases the  Heat resistance of a Warframe's health and shields.

name: Heavy Impact
description: Heavy Impact allows a Warframe to create shockwave from heavy landings that knocks foes off their feet.

name: Rifle Amp
description: Rifle Amp is an Aura that increases the damage dealt with rifles.

name: Maglev
description: Maglev is a Warframe mod that increases slide speed, and decreases Friction.

name: Speed Holster
description: Speed Holster is an Aura that increases weapon holstering and unholstering speed for all players in a squad.

name: Antitoxin
description: Antitoxin increases the Toxin resistance of a Warframe's health.

name: Rage
description: Rage is a Warframe mod that converts a percentage of Health damage received into Energy.

name: Diamond Skin
description: Diamond Skin increases the  Radiation damage resistance of a Warframe's shield and health.

name: Retribution
description: The Retribution mod grants a chance to damage enemies with  Electricity damage when they strike a Warframe in melee.

name: Lightning Rod
description: Lightning Rod increases the Electrical Damage resistance of a Warframe's health and shields.

name: Insulation
description: Insulation increases the Cold damage resistance of a Warframe's health and shields.

name: Quick Thinking
description: Quick Thinking is a mod that uses the Warframe's residual energy pool as an emergency buffer to prevent death whenever a player drops to 2 Health.

name: Undying Will
description: Undying Will increases the Warframe's bleedout timer.

name: Reflex Guard
description: The Reflex Guard mod grants a chance for a Warframe to automatically parry incoming attacks.

name: Ammo Drum
description: Ammo Drum increases the maximum amount of rifle ammunition your Warframe can carry for that weapon.

name: Streamline
description: The Streamline mod increases the Power Efficiency of Warframe abilities.

name: Master Thief
description: Master Thief grants a chance of unlocking locked lockers.

name: Bane of Infested
description: Bane of Infested increases the damage of rifles against Infested. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Agile Aim
description: Agile Aim is a rifle mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases movement speed while aiming.

name: Continuous Misery
description: Continuous Misery increases the duration of Status Effects inflicted by rifles.

name: Rapid Resilience
description: The Rapid Resilience mod reduces the time procs affect the player.

name: Bane of Grineer
description: Bane of Grineer increases the damage of rifles against Grineer. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Rush
description: The Rush mod increases the speed at which a Warframe moves while sprinting. Rush also increases the distance that both vertical and horizontal wall running maneuvers can cover.

name: Hellfire
description: The Hellfire mod increases  Heat damage by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Comet Rounds
description: Comet Rounds is a PvP exclusive rifle Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Impact damage

name: Stretch
description: Stretch increases Power Range of Warframe abilities.

name: Magazine Warp
description: The Magazine Warp mod increases magazine capacity of rifles.

name: Eagle Eye
description: The Eagle Eye mod increases the zoom of a rifle by 10% per rank up to a maximum of 40% at rank 3. Beginning with Update 12.6, Eagle Eye also increases the range at which Sentinels can shoot enemies if installed on a Sentinel Weapon.

name: Vigor
description: The Vigor mod increases both Shield Capacity and Health attributes of a Warframe by a percentage of their base values.

name: Point Strike
description: The Point Strike mod increases a primary weapon's critical chance by 25% per rank for a maximum of 150% at rank 5.

name: Rupture
description: Rupture increases the  Impact damage of Rifles.

name: Lucky Shot
description: Lucky Shot is a PvP-exclusive rifle mod which provides faster projectile flight speed at the cost of reduced accuracy.

name: Fast Hands
description: The Fast Hands mod increases reload speed by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Piercing Hit
description: The Piercing Hit mod increases  Puncture damage for rifles.

name: Primed Cryo Rounds
description: The Primed Cryo Rounds mod increases  Cold damage of Rifles by 15% per rank for a maximum of 165% at rank 10.

name: Terminal Velocity
description: Terminal Velocity increases flight speed of rifle rounds.

name: Berserker
description: Not to be confused with the Berserker Warframe, Valkyr.

name: Condition Overload
description: Condition Overload grant extra melee damage for each Status Effect type affecting the target.

name: Enduring Strike
description: Enduring Strike increases the status chance of melee weapons while Channeling at the cost of reduced channeling efficiency.

name: Ripper Rounds
description: Ripper Rounds is a PvP exclusive Rifle Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Puncture damage.

name: Stormbringer
description: The Stormbringer mod adds  Electricity damage to a weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at Rank 5.

name: Recover
description: Recover was a PvP-exclusive rifle mod that gave a chance to restore health on kill.

name: Jagged Edge
description: Jagged Edge increase the  Slash damage of a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Sawtooth Clip
description: Sawtooth Clip Increases the  Slash damage of Rifles. Not to be confused with Serration which increases all damage types at once.

name: Melee Prowess
description: Melee Prowess increases the status effect chance of melee weapons.

name: Enduring Affliction
description: Enduring Affliction is a Mod for melee weapons that grants extra Status Effect duration on melee hits while Channeling.

name: Speed Trigger
description: The Speed Trigger mod increases a primary weapon's fire rate by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at Rank 5.

name: Power Throw
description: Power Throw adds Punch Through distance to the charge attacks of Glaive weapons.

name: Focus Energy
description: The Focus Energy mod increases Channeling efficiency and  Electricity damage on melee weapons by 10% and 15% per rank, at a maximum of 40% and 60% at rank 3, respectively.

name: Relentless Combination
description: Relentless Combination grants a chance to deal Combo Counter hits when a target is dealt damage from a Slash b Slash proc caused by the player.

name: Vital Sense
description: The Vital Sense mod increases critical damage on rifles by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at Rank 5.

name: Reflex Coil
description: The Reflex Coil mod increases your melee weapon's Channeling efficiency by 10% per rank, at a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Smite Grineer
description: The Smite Grineer mod increases the damage of melee weapons against Grineer by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Energy Channel
description: The Energy Channel mod converts 50% of energy used to bonus damage on next melee attack and stores up to +50 bonus damage per rank, for a maximum of 200% and +200 at rank 3, respectively.

name: True Steel
description: The True Steel mod increases critical chance on a melee weapon by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Fury
description: The Fury mod increases the attack speed of a melee weapon by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Heavy Trauma
description: Heavy Trauma increases the  Impact damage of melee weapons.

name: Killing Blow
description: Killing Blow increases the channeling damage of a melee weapon by 20% per rank, at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Parry
description: Parry improves the chance to trigger a counterattack prompt on enemies in melee when blocking while channeling.

name: Molten Impact
description: The Molten Impact increases  Heat damage on a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Pressure Point
description: Pressure Point increases damage on melee weapons by 20% per rank, at a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Quick Return
description: Quick Return decreases the number of bounces before a Glaive weapon returns to the player.

name: Blind Shot
description: Blind Shot is a PvP-exclusive pistol mod which provides faster projectile flight speed at the cost of reduced accuracy.

name: Rebound
description: Rebound increases the number of bounces before a Glaive weapon returns to the player.

name: Smite Corpus
description: The Smite Corpus mod increases the damage of melee weapons against Corpus by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: True Punishment
description: While Channeling is active, the True Punishment mod increases a melee weapon's Critical hit chance but decreases Channeling efficiency.

name: Barrel Diffusion
description: Barrel Diffusion increases the multishot of pistols. These additional rounds do not consume extra ammunition.

name: Convulsion
description: Convulsion  increases  Electricity damage on secondary weapons.

name: Expel Corpus
description: Expel Corpus increases the damage of secondary weapons against Corpus.

name: Rending Strike
description: The Rending Strike mod adds an additional 20%  Puncture per rank and 15%  Slash per rank for a maximum of 80% and 60% at rank 3, respectively.

name: Smite Infested
description: The Smite Infested mod increases the damage of melee weapons against Infested by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Expel Grineer
description: Expel Grineer increases the damage of secondary weapons against Grineer.

name: Hawk Eye
description: Hawk Eye increases the zoom of secondary weapons.  Beginning with Update 12.6, Hawk Eye also increases the range at which Sentinels can shoot enemies if installed on a Sentinel Weapon.

name: Gunslinger
description: The Gunslinger mod increases the fire rate of secondary weapons by 12% per rank for a maximum of 72% at rank 5.

name: Whirlwind
description: Whirlwind increases the flight speed of Glaive weapons. As a direct result, this mod also increases throwing distance.

name: Hornet Strike
description: Hornet Strike increases the base damage of secondary weapons by 20% per rank, at a maximum of 220% at rank 10.

name: Hydraulic Barrel
description: Hydraulic Barrel is a PvP-exclusive secondary weapon mod which reduces weapon recoil at the cost of reduced magazine capacity.

name: Lethal Momentum
description: Lethal Momentum increases flight speed of Pistol rounds.

name: Meteor Munitions
description: Meteor Munitions is a PvP exclusive pistol Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Impact damage.

name: Pistol Ammo Mutation
description: Pistol Ammo Mutation is a pistol mod that converts any unused ammo type into Pistol Ammo, or Sniper Ammo in the case of most explosive sidearms. The affected pistol will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered primary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Deep Freeze
description: Deep Freeze increases  Cold damage on a secondary weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Expel Infested
description: Expel Infested increases the damage of secondary weapons against the Infested.

name: Heated Charge
description: The Heated Charge mod increases  Heat damage of a secondary weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Perpetual Agony
description: Perpetual Agony increases the duration of Status Effects inflicted by secondary weapons.

name: Quickdraw
description: The Quickdraw mod increases the reloading speed of a pistol by 8% per rank for a maximum of 48% at rank 5.

name: Ruinous Extension
description: Ruinous Extension increases the range of pistol weapons.

name: Slip Magazine
description: The Slip Magazine increases magazine capacity of a pistol by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Lethal Torrent
description: The Lethal Torrent mod increases both fire rate and multishot percentage. These additional rounds do not consume extra ammunition.

name: Suppress
description: The Suppress mod reduces Noise Level on pistols. At max rank, it renders any pistols completely silent and undetectable while firing.

name: Reflex Draw
description: Reflex Draw is a pistol mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases the holster rate of secondary weapons.

name: Pistol Gambit
description: The Pistol Gambit mod increases the critical hit chance of a pistol by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

name: Stunning Speed
description: The Stunning Speed mod increases reload speed and status effect chance by 10% and 2.5% per rank for a maximum of 40% and 10%, respectively.

name: Razor Shot
description: Razor Shot increases the  Slash damage of pistols.

name: Trick Mag
description: The Trick Mag increases maximum ammo of a pistol by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Scorch
description: The Scorch mod increases the  Heat damage and Status Chance of a pistol by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at Rank 3.

name: Spry Sights
description: Spry Sights is a pistol mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases movement speed while aiming.

name: Chilling Grasp
description: The Chilling Grasp mod increases  Cold damage on shotguns by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5. The picture shows a Frost with a Strun, and a frozen Corpus Crewman.

name: Sure Shot
description: Sure Shot increases the Status Chance of Pistols.

name: Blunderbuss
description: The Blunderbuss increases critical chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Accelerated Blast
description: The Accelerated Blast mod increases the fire rate of Shotguns by 15% and  Puncture damage by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3 for both values.

name: Charged Shell
description: Charged Shell increases the  Electricity damage of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Cleanse Infested
description: The Cleanse Infested mod increases the base damage of shotguns against Infested by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Double-Barrel Drift
description: Double-Barrel Drift is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reduces recoil and spread when firing while sliding.

name: Kill Switch
description: Kill Switch is PvP-exclusive Shotgun mod which increases Reload Speed on Kills.

name: Contagious Spread
description: Contagious Spread increases the  Toxin damage on a Shotgun Weapon.

name: Loose Chamber
description: Loose Chamber is a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod which grants improved reload speed at the cost of increased recoil.

name: Fatal Acceleration
description: Fatal Acceleration increases flight speed of Shotgun rounds.

name: Chilling Reload
description: Chilling Reload increases  Cold damage and Reload Speed of Shotguns.

name: Crash Shot
description: Crash Shot is a PvP exclusive shotgun mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Impact damage.

name: Flak Shot
description: Flak Shot is a PvP exclusive shotgun mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Slash damage.

name: Hell's Chamber
description: Hell's Chamber increases the Multishot percentage of Shotguns.

name: Lingering Torment
description: Lingering Torment increases the duration of Status Effects inflicted by Shotguns.

name: Momentary Pause
description: Momentary Pause was a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod that gave a chance to restore health on kill.

name: Scattering Inferno
description: The Scattering Inferno mod increases both the  Heat damage and Status Chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Shotgun Ammo Mutation
description: Shotgun Ammo Mutation is a shotgun mod that converts any unused ammo type into Shotgun Ammo. The affected shotgun will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered secondary weapons until their own ammo is full.

name: Seeking Force
description: The Seeking Force mod increases Punch Through of a shotgun starting at 0.4 meters, with a maximum of 2.1 meters at rank 5.

name: Shotgun Savvy
description: Shotgun Savvy increases Shotgun Status Chance.

name: Tactical Pump
description: The Tactical Pump mod increases reload speed of a shotgun by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Silent Battery
description: The Silent Battery mod reduces Noise Level on shotguns. At max rank, it renders any shotgun completely silent and undetectable while firing.

name: Redirection
description: Redirection increases the Maximum Shield Capacity of a Warframe. It is the first normal Mod that all new players receive in Warframe, where it is automatically given upon activating the Liset's Mods console.

name: Shock Absorbers
description: The Shock Absorbers mod increases a Warframe's damage resistance while knocked down.

name: Sure Footed
description: Sure Footed increases a Warframe's chance to resist knockdown.

name: Vitality
description: Vitality increases the Maximum Health of a Warframe.

name: Apex Predator
description: Apex Predator is a PvP-exclusive rifle mod that causes targets that are hit to be temporarily visible on the minimap.

name: Firestorm
description: Firestorm increases the area-of-effect radius of the Ignis, Ogris, Penta, Torid, Opticor, and Tonkor.

name: Hush
description: The Hush mod reduces Noise Level on rifles. At max rank, it renders any rifles completely silent and undetectable while firing.

name: Metal Auger
description: Metal Auger increases Punch Through for Rifles.

name: Rifle Aptitude
description: Rifle Aptitude increases the Status Chance of Rifles.

name: Serrated Rounds
description: Serrated Rounds is a PvP exclusive Rifle Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Slash damage.

name: Split Chamber
description: The Split Chamber mod increases the chance of multishot on rifles by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at Rank 5. These additional rounds do not consume extra ammunition.

name: Twitch
description: Twitch is a rifle mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases the holster rate of rifles.

name: Wildfire
description: The Wildfire mod increases magazine capacity and adds additional  Heat damage increasing it to a maximum of 20% and 60% at rank 3, respectively.

name: Dispatch Overdrive
description: Dispatch Overdrive grants a movement speed buff on a Melee Channel kill.

name: Fever Strike
description: Fever Strike increases  Toxin damage on a Melee Weapon.

name: Lasting Sting
description: Lasting Sting increases the duration of Status Effects inflicted by melee weapons.

name: North Wind
description: The North Wind mod increases  Cold damage on a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Second Wind
description: The Second Wind mod gives Stamina when an enemy is killed using Channeling, at the cost of Channeling efficiency.

name: Air Recon
description: Air Recon is a pistol mod usable in both PvE and PvP that decreases zoom during Aim Glide.

name: Calculated Victory
description: Calculated Victory was a PvP-exclusive pistol mod that gave a chance to restore shields on kill.

name: Eject Magazine
description: Eject Magazine is a pistol mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reloads a portion of a secondary weapon's magazine for each second while holstered.

name: Heavy Warhead
description: Heavy Warhead is PvP-exclusive Pistol Mod which increases explosion radius for a reduction in flight speed.

name: Ice Storm
description: Ice Storm increases the magazine capacity and  Cold damage of Pistols.

name: Loose Magazine
description: Loose Magazine is a PvP-exclusive secondary weapon mod which grants improved reload speed at the cost of increased recoil.

name: No Return
description: No Return increases the  Puncture damage of a pistol.

name: Razor Munitions
description: Razor Munitions is a PvP exclusive Pistol Mod that converts an amount of damage to Slash damage.

name: Secondary Wind
description: Secondary Wind is PvP-exclusive Pistol Mod which increases Health Regen on Kills.

name: Steady Hands
description: The Steady Hands mod is a pistol mod that reduces the recoil produced from firing a weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Ammo Stock
description: The Ammo Stock mod increases shotgun magazine capacity by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Broad Eye
description: Broad Eye is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that decreases zoom during Aim Glide.

name: Cleanse Corpus
description: The Cleanse Corpus mod increases the base damage of shotguns against Corpus by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Flechette
description: Flechette increases the  Puncture damage of shotguns.

name: Hydraulic Chamber
description: Hydraulic Chamber is a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod which reduces weapon recoil at the cost of reduced magazine capacity.

name: Loaded Capacity
description: Loaded Capacity is a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod which grants increased magazine capacity at the cost of reduced reload speed.

name: Prize Kill
description: Prize Kill was a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod that gave a chance to restore shields on kill.

name: Shotgun Spazz
description: The Shotgun Spazz mod increases fire rate of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Snap Shot
description: Snap Shot is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases movement speed while aiming.

name: Unleashed
description: The  Unleashed  mod allows the Sunika Kubrow to grapple a VIP target, forcing them to the ground.

name: Physique
description: Physique is an Aura that increases maximum health.

name: Shield Disruption
description: Shield Disruption is an Aura that reduces the shield capacity of all enemies.

name: Stand United
description: Stand United is an Aura that increases Armor.

name: Equilibrium
description: Equilibrium restores additional Energy when collecting Health Orbs, and additional Health when collecting Energy Orbs. Converted orbs are denoted by a  symbol.

name: Fortitude
description: Fortitude increases chance to resist knockdown effects and increases the shield recharge rate of a Warframe.

name: Intruder
description: Intruder is a mod that decreases the difficulty of Hacking consoles. Depending on the console involved, it will either increase the time limit for Corpus consoles or decrease the speed of the needle in Grineer consoles.

name: Natural Talent
description: Natural Talent improves casting speed of most Warframe abilities.

name: Provoked
description: Provoked increases the damage dealt by a Warframe while in bleedout.

name: Reflection
description: The Reflection mod increases the damage that blocking reflects back at attackers when blocking while channeling.

name: Steel Fiber
description: Steel Fiber increases the armor of a Warframe.

name: Thief's Wit
description: Thief's Wit is a Warframe mod which adds a loot radar to the minimap. The loot radar will display resources, lootable canisters, chests, crates, and lootable corpses (which only appear during the self-destruction environmental hazard) on the mini-map. It will also locate Medallions in Syndicate Alert Missions and Resource Caches in Sabotage missions. Thief's Wit will not display lockers or dropped blueprints.

name: Warm Coat
description: Warm Coat increases a Warframe's shield resistance against the cryogenic temperatures environmental hazard.

name: Bane of Corpus
description: Bane of Corpus increases the damage of rifles against Corpus. The mod increases both the base damage and elemental damage of a weapon.

name: Combustion Beam
description: Combustion Beam  causes enemies killed by beam weapons to explode, dealing up to 600 damage shortly after death.

name: Cryo Rounds
description: The Cryo Rounds mod increases  Cold damage on a weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Hammer Shot
description: Hammer Shot increases the critical damage multiplier and the status effect chance of rifles.

name: Infected Clip
description: Infected Clip increases  Toxin damage done by rifles.

name: Serration
description: The Serration mod increases the base damage of primary weapons (excluding shotguns) by 15% per rank, at a maximum of 165% at rank 10.

name: Stabilizer
description: The Stabilizer mod is a rifle mod that reduces the recoil produced from firing a weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at Rank 3.

name: Vanquished Prey
description: Vanquished Prey was a PvP-exclusive rifle mod that gave a chance to restore shields on kill.

name: Drifting Contact
description: Drifting Contact is a rare Melee mod that extends the duration of the Melee Combo Counter and increases Status Chance.

name: Finishing Touch
description: The Finishing Touch mod increases damage dealt by the combat finisher attack, ground finisher attack and stealth attack of melee weapons.

name: Healing Return
description: Healing Return heals the player when hitting a target currently affected by a Status Effect proc.

name: Organ Shatter
description: Organ Shatter increases the critical damage of a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Reach
description: Reach increases the range of a melee weapon's attacks, except Glaive (Prime), Kestrel, and Halikar's thrown-distance (they can hit enemies more easily, though, because the projectile can reach a greater swath). Reach also increases the range at which Sentinels can attack enemies if installed on a Sentinel Weapon.

name: Shocking Touch
description: Shocking Touch increases  Electricity damage on a melee weapon by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Sundering Strike
description: Sundering Strike increases  Puncture damage on a melee weapon.

name: Concussion Rounds
description: Concussion Rounds increases the  Impact damage done by Pistols.

name: Full Capacity
description: Full Capacity is a PvP-exclusive secondary weapon mod  mod which grants increased magazine capacity at the cost of reduced reload speed.

name: Impaler Munitions
description: Impaler Munitions is a PvP exclusive Pistol Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Puncture damage.

name: Pathogen Rounds
description: Pathogen Rounds adds +15%  Toxin damage per rank to pistols.

name: Recuperate
description: Recuperate was a PvP-exclusive secondary weapon mod that gave a chance to restore health on each kill.

name: Seeker
description: The Seeker mod increases Punch Through of a pistol by 0.35 per rank for a maximum of 2.1 at rank 5.

name: Strafing Slide
description: Strafing Slide is a pistol mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reduces recoil and spread when firing while sliding.

name: Target Cracker
description: The Target Cracker mod increases the critical damage of a pistol by 10% for each rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Blaze
description: Blaze increases both overall damage and  Heat damage to shotguns by 15% per rank, at a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

name: Cleanse Grineer
description: The Cleanse Grineer mod increases the base damage of shotguns against Grineer by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Disruptor
description: Disruptor increases the  Impact damage of Shotguns.

name: Incendiary Coat
description: The Incendiary Coat mod increases  Heat damage of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Lock and Load
description: Lock and Load is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reloads a portion of a shotgun's magazine for each second it is holstered.

name: Point Blank
description: The Point Blank mod increases the base damage of a shotgun by 15% per rank at a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

name: Ravage
description: The Ravage mod increases the critical damage of a shotgun by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Shell Compression
description: The Shell Compression mod increases maximum ammo of a shotgun by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

name: Soft Hands
description: Soft Hands is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases the holster rate of shotguns.

name: Silva & Aegis Prime
description: The Silva & Aegis Prime are the Prime counterparts to the  Heat-based sword and shield combo weapons, Silva & Aegis.

name: Sybaris Prime
description: The Sybaris Prime is the Prime variant of the Sybaris burst-fire rifle. Released alongside Oberon Prime and Silva & Aegis Prime, it features the highest base damage of all the Sybaris variants and is geared towards inflicting Status Effects.

name: Oberon Prime
description: Release Date: May 30th, 2017. Oberon Prime is the primed variant of the Oberon Warframe featuring more powerful stats: 25 extra energy and 75 extra armor, as well as two additional  polarities, and a new particle effect on his Reckoning ability and his Hallowed Ground ability.

name: Hydroid Prime
description: Release Date: August 29th, 2017. Hydroid Prime is the primed variant of the Hydroid Warframe featuring more powerful stats: increased armor, energy and shield ratings, as well as an additional  and  polarity. It was released alongside Ballistica Prime and Nami Skyla Prime.

name: Nami Skyla Prime
description: The Nami Skyla Prime is the Prime variant to the Nami Skyla. It was released in Update 21.6 alongside Ballistica Prime and Hydroid Prime.

name: Ballistica Prime
description: The Ballistica Prime is the Prime variant of the Ballistica. It was released in Update 21.6 alongside Hydroid Prime and Nami Skyla Prime.

name: Entropy Spike
description: The Entropy Spike mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that adds an explosion chance and Entropy specifically for the Bolto. It increases the explosion chance by 0.05 and Entropy by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 0.2 and 1 at rank 3, respectively. Explosions deal 250  Blast damage to the target, as well as to nearby enemies within 10 meters of the blast (scaled by distance).

name: Divebomb Vortex
description: Divebomb Vortex is a Warframe Augment Mod for Zephyr that makes Dive Bomb pull enemies within its radius towards the impact point.

name: Superior Defenses
description: The Superior Defenses mod increases the Shield Recharge Rate of an Archwing by 25% per rank at a maximum of 100% at rank 3.

name: Cutting Edge
description: The Cutting Edge mod increases melee damage of an Archwing melee weapon by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

name: Swift Deth
description: Swift Deth mod allows Dethcube to attack the first visible enemy in range.

name: Toxic Sequence
description: The Toxic Sequence mod is a Weapon Augment Mod that increases status duration and Sequence specifically for the Acrid. It increases status duration by 50% and Sequence by 0.25 per rank, at a maximum of 200% and 1 at rank 3, respectively.

name: Hall of Malevolence
description: Hall of Malevolence is a Warframe Augment Mod for Mirage's Hall of Mirrors that makes her doppelgangers deal more damage with every enemy killed.

name: Venom Dose
description: Venom Dose is a Warframe Augment Mod for Saryn that allows Spores to be cast on allies, temporarily granting them additional  Toxin damage to all attacks.
